lead_paragraph: Adrian Peterson will have surgery on his right knee to repair a torn meniscus, putting his season and perhaps his 10-year run with Minnesota in question.

headline.print_headline: Adrian Peterson to Have Knee Surgery, Season in Flux
headline.main: Adrian Peterson to Have Knee Surgery, Season in Flux

snippet: Adrian Peterson will have surgery on his right knee to repair a torn meniscus, putting his season and perhaps his 10-year run with Minnesota in question....
